33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Umar bin Al-Khattab narrated that the Prophet(s.a.w) said:"Shall I not inform you of the best of your leaders and the worst of them: The best of them are those whom you love and they love you, you supplicate for them, and they supplicate for you. And the evilest of your leaders are those who hate you, and you hate them, and they curse you and you curse them

chapter.eng-name: Regarding The Best Of Leaders And Their Worst
